nodes.description: 人们作为叛乱分子-政权交换的一部分，乘坐巴士车队撤离他们的城镇。
nodes.support_text: The blast struck buses of people leaving their towns as part of a rebel-regime swap.

nodes.description: 星期六，一个汽车炸弹袭击了载有撤离人员的巴士车队。
nodes.support_text: The blast hit a convoy of buses Saturday, according to the Syrian Observatory for Human Rights, which reported the higher death toll.

nodes.description: 星期日，一个监督小组报告称，死亡人数已上升至126人。
nodes.support_text: The death toll from a bomb attack targeting evacuees leaving besieged Syrian towns has risen to 126, a monitoring group said Sunday.

nodes.description: 至少55名其他人在爆炸中受伤。
nodes.support_text: At least 55 others are injured, group says

edges.support_text: The blast struck buses of people leaving their towns as part of a rebel-regime swap.
The death toll from a bomb attack targeting evacuees leaving besieged Syrian towns has risen to 126, a monitoring group said Sunday.
The blast struck buses of people... At least 55 others are injured
叛军护卫车队发生在车队被袭击之前。
